bike.description: SX Trail M5 Manipulated Alloy frame, ORE TT/DT, forged HT, low center of gravity design, full cartridge bearing pivots, ISCG mount, replaceable derailleur hanger, slalom geometry

components.description: Fox DHX 5.0 rear shock with full adjustability - rebound, ProPedal and bottom-out control.
Thomson Elite Straight w/ 12 degree clamp, 367mm
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
